author: dchristian3188
body:
Currently splitting a UNC root on windows will return a empty string. 

Please reference:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/2301

comments.body: Thanks iSazonov, never used test cases before. Changes uploaded.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@dchristian3188 Thanks! Maybe these tests would have to be [here](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Management/FileSystem.Tests.ps1#L563) and then we need to bring them to the format of those tests.

Wait for the PG conclusion.

title: Updated FileSystem Provider to Split UNC Paths
